snippet: Maison Louis Marie introduces oils for the skin to complement its irresistible home fragrances. Here, the actress Grace Gummer stars in a video that captures their dreamlike effect.
lead_paragraph: Maison Louis Marie introduces oils for the skin to complement its irresistible home fragrances. Here, the actress Grace Gummer stars in a video that captures their dreamlike effect.

headline.main: A Coveted Candle Line Branches Out into Personal Perfumes
